title:
A new look at the classiffication of the tri-covectors of a
  6-dimensional symplectic space
authors: Jaime Mu\~noz Masqu\'e, Luis Miguel Pozo Coronado
abstract:
Let $\mathbb{F}$ be a field of characteristic $\neq 2$ and $3$, let $V$ be a
$\mathbb{F}$-vector space of dimension $6$, and let $\Omega \in \wedge ^2V^\ast
$ be a non-degenerate form. A system of generators for polynomial invariant
functions under the tensorial action of the group $Sp(\Omega )$ on $\wedge ^3
V^\ast $, is given explicitly. Applications of these results to the normal
forms of De Bruyn-Kwiatkowski and Popov are given.
